Name: Last Village
About the game: You arrive in the village at time of onset of a thunderstorm and in your attempts to find shelter from weather you realize that something is wrong... The thunderstorm never begins, and the village is invaded by alien creatures. You have to fight back with a shotgun and free the village. To do this, you have to go through abandoned houses and structures, bypass traps, fight alien creatures and the main boss. Don't forget to collect ammo for numerous battles and pick up the right things. Gameplay: You have to make your way through abandoned houses and factories. Fight alien invaders. Look for secrets and ammunition. Bypass traps. Avoid aggressive aliens. Defeat bosses. Features: Unique levels. Responsive controls. Detailed graphics and good optimization. Intense battles. Mystical surroundings. Two endings.
